item.title: Setup Nest on Cloud Functions
item.description: Setting up NestJS on Firebase Cloud Functions allows you to leverage the power of NestJS in serverless environments. Below are two different techniques for achieving this integration. Option A - Point a Function to Nest This setup modifies the functions configuration to use the Nest /dist output instead of the default functions directory. It’s suitable for existing Nest applications. Step 1 - Create Nest App Generate a new Nest app and remove the automatically generated functions directory.
